blocks.name: emptycls
blocks.content: Extend class notation to include the empty set.
blocks.origin: const class emptycls { âˆ… }

blocks.name: diff.emptycls.s
diff.emptycls.c
diff.emptycls.w
df-nul
blocks.content: Define the empty set. More precisely, we should write "empty class". It will be posited in ~ ax-nul that an empty set exists. Then, by uniqueness among classes ( ~ eq0 , as opposed to the weaker uniqueness among sets, ~ nulmo ), it will follow that ` (/) ` is indeed a set ( ~ 0ex ). Special case of Exercise 4.10(o) of [Mendelson] p. 231. For a more traditional definition, but requiring a dummy variable, see ~ dfnul2 . (Contributed by NM, 17-Jun-1993.) Clarify that at this point, it is not established that it is a set. (Revised by BJ, 22-Sep-2022.)

blocks.name: dfnul2
blocks.content: Alternate definition of the empty set. Definition 5.14 of [TakeutiZaring] p. 20. (Contributed by NM, 26-Dec-1996.) Remove dependency on ~ ax-10 , ~ ax-11 , and ~ ax-12 . (Revised by Steven Nguyen, 3-May-2023.)

blocks.name: dfnul2OLD
blocks.content: Obsolete version of ~ dfnul2 as of 3-May-2023. Alternate definition of the empty set. Definition 5.14 of [TakeutiZaring] p. 20. (Contributed by NM, 26-Dec-1996.) (New usage is discouraged.) (Proof modification is discouraged.)
blocks.origin:
thm dfnul2OLD(setvar s0) {
  |- wceq(emptycls, cab(s0, wn(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s0)))))
} = {
  abbi2i(s0, emptycls, wn(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s0))))
  3bitri(wcel(cv(s0), emptycls), wn(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s0))), wcel(cv(s0), cdif(universe, universe)), wa(wcel(cv(s0), universe), wn(wcel(cv(s0), universe))))
  eleq2i(cv(s0), emptycls, cdif(universe, universe))
  df-nul()
  eldif(cv(s0), universe, universe)
  con2bii(wa(wcel(cv(s0), universe), wn(wcel(cv(s0), universe))), wceq(cv(s0), cv(s0)))
  2th(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s0)), wn(wa(wcel(cv(s0), universe), wn(wcel(cv(s0), universe)))))
  eqid(cv(s0))
  pm3.24(wcel(cv(s0), universe))
  diff.emptycls.s(s0)
}

blocks.name: dfnul3
blocks.content: Alternate definition of the empty set. (Contributed by NM, 25-Mar-2004.)

blocks.name: noel
blocks.content: The empty set has no elements. Theorem 6.14 of [Quine] p. 44. (Contributed by NM, 21-Jun-1993.) (Proof shortened by Mario Carneiro, 1-Sep-2015.) Remove dependency on ~ ax-10 , ~ ax-11 , and ~ ax-12 . (Revised by Steven Nguyen, 3-May-2023.)

thm noel(class c0) {
  |- wn(wcel(c0, emptycls))
} = {
  mtbir(wcel(c0, emptycls), wex(hs0, wa(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cv(hs0), emptycls))))
  nex(hs0, wa(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cv(hs0), emptycls)))
  intnan(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cv(hs0), emptycls))
  mtbir(wcel(cv(hs0), emptycls), wcel(cv(hs0), cab(hs1, wa(wcel(cv(hs1), universe), wn(wcel(cv(hs1), universe))))))
  mto(wcel(cv(hs0), cab(hs1, wa(wcel(cv(hs1), universe), wn(wcel(cv(hs1), universe))))), wex(hs1, wa(wcel(cv(hs1), universe), wn(wcel(cv(hs1), universe)))))
  nex(hs1, wa(wcel(cv(hs1), universe), wn(wcel(cv(hs1), universe))))
  pm3.24(wcel(cv(hs1), universe))
  sylbi(wcel(cv(hs0), cab(hs1, wa(wcel(cv(hs1), universe), wn(wcel(cv(hs1), universe))))), wex(hs1, wa(wcel(cv(hs1), universe), wn(wcel(cv(hs1), universe)))), wsb(hs0, hs1, wa(wcel(cv(hs1), universe), wn(wcel(cv(hs1), universe)))))
  df-clab(hs0, hs1, wa(wcel(cv(hs1), universe), wn(wcel(cv(hs1), universe))))
  spsbe(hs0, hs1, wa(wcel(cv(hs1), universe), wn(wcel(cv(hs1), universe))))
  eleq2i(cv(hs0), emptycls, cab(hs1, wa(wcel(cv(hs1), universe), wn(wcel(cv(hs1), universe)))))
  eqtri(emptycls, cab(hs1, wa(wcel(cv(hs1), universe), wn(wcel(cv(hs1), universe)))), cdif(universe, universe))
  df-nul()
  df-dif(hs1, universe, universe)
  df-clel(hs0, c0, emptycls)
  diff.hs1.c(universe)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(emptycls)
}

blocks.name: n0i
blocks.content: If a class has elements, then it is not empty. (Contributed by NM, 31-Dec-1993.)

blocks.name: ne0i
blocks.content: If a class has elements, then it is nonempty. (Contributed by NM, 31-Dec-1993.)

blocks.name: ne0d
blocks.content: Deduction form of ~ ne0i . If a class has elements, then it is nonempty. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 23-Oct-2021.)

blocks.name: n0ii
blocks.content: If a class has elements, then it is not empty. Inference associated with ~ n0i . (Contributed by BJ, 15-Jul-2021.)

blocks.name: ne0ii
blocks.content: If a class has elements, then it is nonempty. Inference associated with ~ ne0i . (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 11-Dec-2019.)

blocks.name: vn0
blocks.content: The universal class is not equal to the empty set. (Contributed by NM, 11-Sep-2008.)

blocks.name: eq0f
blocks.content: A class is equal to the empty set if and only if it has no elements. Theorem 2 of [Suppes] p. 22. (Contributed by BJ, 15-Jul-2021.)

blocks.name: neq0f
blocks.content: A class is not empty if and only if it has at least one element. Proposition 5.17(1) of [TakeutiZaring] p. 20. This version of ~ neq0 requires only that ` x ` not be free in, rather than not occur in, ` A ` . (Contributed by BJ, 15-Jul-2021.)

blocks.name: n0f
blocks.content: A class is nonempty if and only if it has at least one element. Proposition 5.17(1) of [TakeutiZaring] p. 20. This version of ~ n0 requires only that ` x ` not be free in, rather than not occur in, ` A ` . (Contributed by NM, 17-Oct-2003.)

blocks.name: eq0
blocks.content: A class is equal to the empty set if and only if it has no elements. Theorem 2 of [Suppes] p. 22. (Contributed by NM, 29-Aug-1993.)

blocks.name: neq0
blocks.content: A class is not empty if and only if it has at least one element. Proposition 5.17(1) of [TakeutiZaring] p. 20. (Contributed by NM, 21-Jun-1993.)

blocks.name: n0
blocks.content: A class is nonempty if and only if it has at least one element. Proposition 5.17(1) of [TakeutiZaring] p. 20. (Contributed by NM, 29-Sep-2006.)

blocks.name: nel0
blocks.content: From the general negation of membership in ` A ` , infer that ` A ` is the empty set. (Contributed by BJ, 6-Oct-2018.)

blocks.name: reximdva0
blocks.content: Restricted existence deduced from nonempty class. (Contributed by NM, 1-Feb-2012.)

thm reximdva0(setvar s0, class c0, wff w0, wff w1) {
  |- wi(wa(w0, wne(c0, emptycls)), wrex(s0, c0, w1))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), w1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
} = {
  sylibr(wa(w0, wne(c0, emptycls)), wrex(s0, c0, w1), wex(s0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), w1)))
  sylan2b(w0, wne(c0, emptycls), wex(s0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), w1)), wex(s0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)))
  n0(s0, c0)
  imp(w0, wex(s0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wex(s0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), w1)))
  eximdv(s0, w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0), wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), w1))
  ancld(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0), w1)
  ex(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0), w1)
  df-rex(s0, c0, w1)
}

blocks.name: n0rex
blocks.content: There is an element in a nonempty class which is an element of the class. (Contributed by AV, 17-Dec-2020.)

blocks.name: ssn0rex
blocks.content: There is an element in a class with a nonempty subclass which is an element of the subclass. (Contributed by AV, 17-Dec-2020.)

blocks.name: n0moeu
blocks.content: A case of equivalence of "at most one" and "only one". (Contributed by FL, 6-Dec-2010.)

blocks.name: rex0
blocks.content: Vacuous restricted existential quantification is false. (Contributed by NM, 15-Oct-2003.)

blocks.name: reu0
blocks.content: Vacuous restricted uniqueness is always false. (Contributed by AV, 3-Apr-2023.)

blocks.name: rmo0
blocks.content: Vacuous restricted at-most-one quantifier is always true. (Contributed by AV, 3-Apr-2023.)

blocks.name: 0el
blocks.content: Membership of the empty set in another class. (Contributed by NM, 29-Jun-2004.)

blocks.name: n0el
blocks.content: Negated membership of the empty set in another class. (Contributed by Rodolfo Medina, 25-Sep-2010.)

thm n0el(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0) {

  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
} = {
  3bitr4ri(wn(wcel(emptycls, c0)), wral(s0, c0, wex(s1, wcel(cv(s1), cv(s0)))), wral(s0, c0, wn(wal(s1, wn(wcel(cv(s1), cv(s0)))))), wal(s0, wi(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wn(wal(s1, wn(wcel(cv(s1), cv(s0))))))))

  df-ex(s1, wcel(cv(s1), cv(s0)))
  3bitr4ri(wn(wcel(emptycls, c0)), wal(s0, wi(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wn(wal(s1, wn(wcel(cv(s1), cv(s0))))))), wal(s0, wn(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wal(s1, wn(wcel(cv(s1), cv(s0))))))), wn(wex(s0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wal(s1, wn(wcel(cv(s1), cv(s0))))))))
  alnex(s0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wal(s1, wn(wcel(cv(s1), cv(s0))))))
  imnang(s0, wcel(cv(s0), c0), wal(s1, wn(wcel(cv(s1), cv(s0)))))
  notbii(wcel(emptycls, c0), wex(s0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wal(s1, wn(wcel(cv(s1), cv(s0)))))))
  bitri(wcel(emptycls, c0), wex(s0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wal(s1, wn(wcel(cv(s1), cv(s0)))))), wrex(s0, c0, wal(s1, wn(wcel(cv(s1), cv(s0))))))
  0el(s0, s1, c0)
  df-rex(s0, c0, wal(s1, wn(wcel(cv(s1), cv(s0)))))
}

blocks.name: eqeuel
blocks.content: A condition which implies the existence of a unique element of a class. (Contributed by AV, 4-Jan-2022.)
blocks.origin:
thm eqeuel(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0) {
  |- wi(wa(wne(c0, emptycls), wal(s0, wal(s1, wi(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s1), c0)), wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)))))), weu(s0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
} = {
  sylibr(wa(wne(c0, emptycls), wal(s0, wal(s1, wi(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s1), c0)), wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)))))), weu(s0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wa(wex(s0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wal(s0, wal(s1, wi(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s1), c0)), wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)))))))
  anim1i(wne(c0, emptycls), wal(s0, wal(s1, wi(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s1), c0)), wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1))))), wex(s0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)))
  biimpi(wne(c0, emptycls), wex(s0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)))
  n0(s0, c0)
  eu4(s0, s1, wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s1), c0))
  eleq1w(s0, s1, c0)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, cv(s1), c0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, s1)
  diff.wcel.s(s1, cv(s0), c0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
}

blocks.name: ssdif0
blocks.content: Subclass expressed in terms of difference. Exercise 7 of [TakeutiZaring] p. 22. (Contributed by NM, 29-Apr-1994.)
blocks.origin:
thm ssdif0(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wb(wss(c0, c1), wceq(cdif(c0, c1), emptycls))
} = {

blocks.name: difid
blocks.content: The difference between a class and itself is the empty set. Proposition 5.15 of [TakeutiZaring] p. 20. Also Theorem 32 of [Suppes] p. 28. (Contributed by NM, 22-Apr-2004.)

blocks.name: difidALT
blocks.content: Alternate proof of ~ difid . (Contributed by David Abernethy, 17-Jun-2012.) (Proof modification is discouraged.) (New usage is discouraged.)

blocks.name: dif0
blocks.content: The difference between a class and the empty set. Part of Exercise 4.4 of [Stoll] p. 16. (Contributed by NM, 17-Aug-2004.)

blocks.name: ab0
blocks.content: The class of sets verifying a property is the empty class if and only if that property is a contradiction. See also ~ abn0 (from which it could be proved using as many essential proof steps but one fewer syntactic step, at the cost of depending on ~ df-ne ). (Contributed by BJ, 19-Mar-2021.)

blocks.name: dfnf5
blocks.content: Characterization of non-freeness in a formula in terms of its extension. (Contributed by BJ, 19-Mar-2021.)

blocks.name: ab0orv
blocks.content: The class builder of a wff not containing the abstraction variable is either the empty set or the universal class. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 29-Aug-2013.) (Revised by BJ, 22-Mar-2020.)

blocks.name: abn0
blocks.content: Nonempty class abstraction. See also ~ ab0 . (Contributed by NM, 26-Dec-1996.) (Proof shortened by Mario Carneiro, 11-Nov-2016.)

blocks.name: rab0
blocks.content: Any restricted class abstraction restricted to the empty set is empty. (Contributed by NM, 15-Oct-2003.) (Proof shortened by Andrew Salmon, 26-Jun-2011.) (Proof shortened by JJ, 14-Jul-2021.)

blocks.name: rabeq0
blocks.content: Condition for a restricted class abstraction to be empty. (Contributed by Jeff Madsen, 7-Jun-2010.) (Revised by BJ, 16-Jul-2021.)

blocks.name: rabn0
blocks.content: Nonempty restricted class abstraction. (Contributed by NM, 29-Aug-1999.) (Revised by BJ, 16-Jul-2021.)

blocks.name: rabxm
blocks.content: Law of excluded middle, in terms of restricted class abstractions. (Contributed by Jeff Madsen, 20-Jun-2011.)

blocks.name: rabnc
blocks.content: Law of noncontradiction, in terms of restricted class abstractions. (Contributed by Jeff Madsen, 20-Jun-2011.)

blocks.name: elneldisj
blocks.content: The set of elements ` s ` determining classes ` C ` (which may depend on ` s ` ) containing a special element and the set of elements ` s ` determining classes ` C ` not containing the special element are disjoint. (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 11-Jan-2018.) (Revised by AV, 9-Nov-2020.) (Revised by AV, 17-Dec-2021.)

blocks.name: elnelun
blocks.content: The union of the set of elements ` s ` determining classes ` C ` (which may depend on ` s ` ) containing a special element and the set of elements ` s ` determining classes ` C ` not containing the special element yields the original set. (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 11-Jan-2018.) (Revised by AV, 9-Nov-2020.) (Revised by AV, 17-Dec-2021.)

blocks.name: un0
blocks.content: The union of a class with the empty set is itself. Theorem 24 of [Suppes] p. 27. (Contributed by NM, 15-Jul-1993.)

blocks.name: in0
blocks.content: The intersection of a class with the empty set is the empty set. Theorem 16 of [Suppes] p. 26. (Contributed by NM, 21-Jun-1993.)

blocks.name: 0in
blocks.content: The intersection of the empty set with a class is the empty set. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 17-Aug-2020.)

blocks.name: inv1
blocks.content: The intersection of a class with the universal class is itself. Exercise 4.10(k) of [Mendelson] p. 231. (Contributed by NM, 17-May-1998.)

blocks.name: unv
blocks.content: The union of a class with the universal class is the universal class. Exercise 4.10(l) of [Mendelson] p. 231. (Contributed by NM, 17-May-1998.)

blocks.name: 0ss
blocks.content: The null set is a subset of any class. Part of Exercise 1 of [TakeutiZaring] p. 22. (Contributed by NM, 21-Jun-1993.)

blocks.name: ss0b
blocks.content: Any subset of the empty set is empty. Theorem 5 of [Suppes] p. 23 and its converse. (Contributed by NM, 17-Sep-2003.)

blocks.name: ss0
blocks.content: Any subset of the empty set is empty. Theorem 5 of [Suppes] p. 23. (Contributed by NM, 13-Aug-1994.)

blocks.name: sseq0
blocks.content: A subclass of an empty class is empty. (Contributed by NM, 7-Mar-2007.) (Proof shortened by Andrew Salmon, 26-Jun-2011.)

blocks.name: ssn0
blocks.content: A class with a nonempty subclass is nonempty. (Contributed by NM, 17-Feb-2007.)

blocks.name: 0dif
blocks.content: The difference between the empty set and a class. Part of Exercise 4.4 of [Stoll] p. 16. (Contributed by NM, 17-Aug-2004.)

blocks.name: abf
blocks.content: A class builder with a false argument is empty. (Contributed by NM, 20-Jan-2012.)

blocks.name: eq0rdv
blocks.content: Deduction for equality to the empty set. (Contributed by NM, 11-Jul-2014.)

blocks.name: csbprc
blocks.content: The proper substitution of a proper class for a set into a class results in the empty set. (Contributed by NM, 17-Aug-2018.) (Proof shortened by JJ, 27-Aug-2021.)

blocks.name: csb0
blocks.content: The proper substitution of a class into the empty set is the empty set. (Contributed by NM, 18-Aug-2018.)

blocks.name: sbcel12

thm sbceqg(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wb(wsbc(s0, c0, wceq(c2, c3)), wceq(csb(s0, c0, c2), csb(s0, c0, c3))))
} = {
  syl6bbr(wcel(c0, c1), wsbc(s0, c0, wceq(c2, c3)), wceq(csb(s0, c0, c2), csb(s0, c0, c3)), wceq(cab(hs0, wsbc(s0, c0, wcel(cv(hs0), c2))), cab(hs0, wsbc(s0, c0, wcel(cv(hs0), c3)))))
  vtoclbg(hs1, c0, c1, wsbc(s0, c0, wceq(c2, c3)), wceq(cab(hs0, wsbc(s0, c0, wcel(cv(hs0), c2))), cab(hs0, wsbc(s0, c0, wcel(cv(hs0), c3)))), wsb(hs1, s0, wceq(c2, c3)), wceq(cab(hs0, wsb(hs1, s0, wcel(cv(hs0), c2))), cab(hs0, wsb(hs1, s0, wcel(cv(hs0), c3)))))
  dfsbcq2(hs1, s0, c0, wceq(c2, c3))
  eqeq12d(cab(hs0, wsb(hs1, s0, wcel(cv(hs0), c2))), cab(hs0, wsb(hs1, s0, wcel(cv(hs0), c3))), cab(hs0, wsbc(s0, c0, wcel(cv(hs0), c2))), cab(hs0, wsbc(s0, c0, wcel(cv(hs0), c3))), wceq(cv(hs1), c0))
  abbidv(hs0, wceq(cv(hs1), c0), wsb(hs1, s0, wcel(cv(hs0), c2)), wsbc(s0, c0, wcel(cv(hs0), c2)))
  dfsbcq2(hs1, s0, c0, wcel(cv(hs0), c2))
  abbidv(hs0, wceq(cv(hs1), c0), wsb(hs1, s0, wcel(cv(hs0), c3)), wsbc(s0, c0, wcel(cv(hs0), c3)))
  dfsbcq2(hs1, s0, c0, wcel(cv(hs0), c3))
  sbie(hs1, s0, wceq(c2, c3), wceq(cab(hs0, wsb(hs1, s0, wcel(cv(hs0), c2))), cab(hs0, wsb(hs1, s0, wcel(cv(hs0), c3)))))
  nfeq(s0, cab(hs0, wsb(hs1, s0, wcel(cv(hs0), c2))), cab(hs0, wsb(hs1, s0, wcel(cv(hs0), c3))))
  nfab(s0, hs0, wsb(hs1, s0, wcel(cv(hs0), c2)))
  nfs1v(s0, hs1, wcel(cv(hs0), c2))
  nfab(s0, hs0, wsb(hs1, s0, wcel(cv(hs0), c3)))
  nfs1v(s0, hs1, wcel(cv(hs0), c3))
  eqeq12d(c2, c3, cab(hs0, wsb(hs1, s0, wcel(cv(hs0), c2))), cab(hs0, wsb(hs1, s0, wcel(cv(hs0), c3))), wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs1)))
  sbab(s0, hs1, hs0, c2)
  sbab(s0, hs1, hs0, c3)
  eqeq12i(csb(s0, c0, c2), csb(s0, c0, c3), cab(hs0, wsbc(s0, c0, wcel(cv(hs0), c2))), cab(hs0, wsbc(s0, c0, wcel(cv(hs0), c3))))
  df-csb(s0, hs0, c0, c2)
  df-csb(s0, hs0, c0, c3)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.w(wsbc(s0, c0, wceq(c2, c3)))
  diff.hs1.w(wceq(cab(hs0, wsbc(s0, c0, wcel(cv(hs0), c2))), cab(hs0, wsbc(s0, c0, wcel(cv(hs0), c3)))))
  diff.hs0.w(wceq(cv(hs1), c0))
  diffss.ex(s0, hs1)
  diff.hs1.s(s0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs1.s(hs0)

  diff.hs0.c(c3)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
}

  abbidv(hs0, hs1 = c0, [hs1 / s0]hs0 âˆˆ c3, [c0 / s0]hs0 âˆˆ c3)
  dfsbcq2(hs1, s0, c0, hs0 âˆˆ c3)

  nfeq(s0, { hs0 |[hs1 / s0]hs0 âˆˆ c2 }, { hs0 |[hs1 / s0]hs0 âˆˆ c3 })

  nfab(s0, hs0, [hs1 / s0]hs0 âˆˆ c3)
  nfs1v(s0, hs1, hs0 âˆˆ c3)
  eqeq12d(c2, c3, { hs0 |[hs1 / s0]hs0 âˆˆ c2 }, { hs0 |[hs1 / s0]hs0 âˆˆ c3 }, s0 = hs1)
  sbab(s0, hs1, hs0, c2)
  sbab(s0, hs1, hs0, c3)
  eqeq12i([c0 / s0]c2, [c0 / s0]c3, { hs0 |[c0 / s0]hs0 âˆˆ c2 }, { hs0 |[c0 / s0]hs0 âˆˆ c3 })
  df-csb(s0, hs0, c0, c2)
  df-csb(s0, hs0, c0, c3)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.w([c0 / s0]c2 = c3)
  diff.hs1.w({ hs0 |[c0 / s0]hs0 âˆˆ c2 } = { hs0 |[c0 / s0]hs0 âˆˆ c3 })
  diff.hs0.w(hs1 = c0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs1)
  diff.hs1.s(s0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs1.s(hs0)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c3)

thm sbcne12(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wb(wsbc(s0, c0, wne(c1, c2)), wne(csb(s0, c0, c1), csb(s0, c0, c2)))
} = {
  pm2.61i(wb(wsbc(s0, c0, wne(c1, c2)), wne(csb(s0, c0, c1), csb(s0, c0, c2))), wcel(c0, universe))
  con4bid(wcel(c0, universe), wsbc(s0, c0, wne(c1, c2)), wne(csb(s0, c0, c1), csb(s0, c0, c2)))
  3bitr3d(wcel(c0, universe), wn(wsbc(s0, c0, wne(c1, c2))), wn(wne(csb(s0, c0, c1), csb(s0, c0, c2))), wsbc(s0, c0, wn(wne(c1, c2))), wsbc(s0, c0, wceq(c1, c2)))
  a1i(wcel(c0, universe), wb(wsbc(s0, c0, wn(wne(c1, c2))), wsbc(s0, c0, wceq(c1, c2))))
  sbcbii(s0, c0, wn(wne(c1, c2)), wceq(c1, c2))
  nne(c1, c2)
  sbcng(s0, c0, universe, wne(c1, c2))
  syl6bbr(wcel(c0, universe), wsbc(s0, c0, wceq(c1, c2)), wn(wne(csb(s0, c0, c1), csb(s0, c0, c2))), wceq(csb(s0, c0, c1), csb(s0, c0, c2)))
  sbceqg(s0, c0, universe, c1, c2)
  2falsed(wn(wcel(c0, universe)), wsbc(s0, c0, wne(c1, c2)), wne(csb(s0, c0, c1), csb(s0, c0, c2)))
  con3i(wcel(c0, universe), wsbc(s0, c0, wne(c1, c2)))
  sbcex(s0, c0, wne(c1, c2))
  sylibr(wn(wcel(c0, universe)), wn(wne(csb(s0, c0, c1), csb(s0, c0, c2))), wceq(csb(s0, c0, c1), csb(s0, c0, c2)))
  eqtr4d(csb(s0, c0, c1), csb(s0, c0, c2), emptycls, wn(wcel(c0, universe)))
  csbprc(s0, c0, c1)
  csbprc(s0, c0, c2)
  nne(csb(s0, c0, c1), csb(s0, c0, c2))
}

thm csbcom(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wceq(csb(s0, c0, csb(s1, c1, c2)), csb(s1, c1, csb(s0, c0, c2)))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
} = {
  eqriv(hs0, csb(s0, c0, csb(s1, c1, c2)), csb(s1, c1, csb(s0, c0, c2)))
  3bitr3i(wcel(cv(hs0), csb(s0, c0, csb(s1, c1, c2))), wcel(cv(hs0), csb(s1, c1, csb(s0, c0, c2))), wsbc(s0, c0, wcel(cv(hs0), csb(s1, c1, c2))), wsbc(s1, c1, wcel(cv(hs0), csb(s0, c0, c2))))
  3bitr3i(wsbc(s0, c0, wcel(cv(hs0), csb(s1, c1, c2))), wsbc(s1, c1, wcel(cv(hs0), csb(s0, c0, c2))), wsbc(s0, c0, wsbc(s1, c1, wcel(cv(hs0), c2))), wsbc(s1, c1, wsbc(s0, c0, wcel(cv(hs0), c2))))
  sbccom(s0, s1, c0, c1, wcel(cv(hs0), c2))
  sbcbii(s0, c0, wsbc(s1, c1, wcel(cv(hs0), c2)), wcel(cv(hs0), csb(s1, c1, c2)))
  sbcel2(s1, c1, cv(hs0), c2)
  sbcbii(s1, c1, wsbc(s0, c0, wcel(cv(hs0), c2)), wcel(cv(hs0), csb(s0, c0, c2)))
  sbcel2(s0, c0, cv(hs0), c2)
  sbcel2(s0, c0, cv(hs0), csb(s1, c1, c2))
  sbcel2(s1, c1, cv(hs0), csb(s0, c0, c2))
  diff.hs0.c(csb(s0, c0, csb(s1, c1, c2)))
  diff.hs0.c(csb(s1, c1, csb(s0, c0, c2)))
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
}

} = {

  3bitr3i([c0 / s0]hs0 âˆˆ[c1 / s1]c2, [c1 / s1]hs0 âˆˆ[c0 / s0]c2, [c0 / s0][c1 / s1]hs0 âˆˆ c2, [c1 / s1][c0 / s0]hs0 âˆˆ c2)

  nfa1(s0, wnf(s1, w0))
  a1i(wal(s0, wnf(s1, w0)), wnfc(s1, csb(s1, cv(hs0), c2)))
  nfcsb1v(s1, cv(hs0), c2)
  sp(s0, wnf(s1, w0))
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.w(wi(wal(s0, wnf(s1, w0)), wb(wsbc(s1, c0, wsbc(s0, c2, w0)), wsbc(s0, csb(s1, c0, c2), w0))))

thm csbnestgf(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {

  syl5bb(wa(wcel(c0, universe), wal(s0, wnfc(s1, c2))), wsbc(s1, c0, wcel(cv(hs0), csb(s0, c3, c2))), wsbc(s0, csb(s1, c0, c3), wcel(cv(hs0), c2)), wsbc(s1, c0, wsbc(s0, c3, wcel(cv(hs0), c2))))
  sbcbii(s1, c0, wcel(cv(hs0), csb(s0, c3, c2)), wsbc(s0, c3, wcel(cv(hs0), c2)))
  abeq2i(hs0, csb(s0, c3, c2), wsbc(s0, c3, wcel(cv(hs0), c2)))

  sylan2(wcel(c0, universe), wal(s0, wnfc(s1, c2)), wb(wsbc(s1, c0, wsbc(s0, c3, wcel(cv(hs0), c2))), wsbc(s0, csb(s1, c0, c3), wcel(cv(hs0), c2))), wal(s0, wnf(s1, wcel(cv(hs0), c2))))

blocks.origin:
thm sbcco3g(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wb(wsbc(s0, c0, wsbc(s1, c2, w0)), wsbc(s1, c3, w0)))
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wceq(c2, c3))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
} = {
  bitrd(wcel(c0, c1), wsbc(s0, c0, wsbc(s1, c2, w0)), wsbc(s1, c3, w0), wsbc(s1, csb(s0, c0, c2), w0))
  sbcnestg(s0, s1, c0, c1, c2, w0)
  3syl(wcel(c0, c1), wb(wsbc(s1, csb(s0, c0, c2), w0), wsbc(s1, c3, w0)), wcel(c0, universe), wceq(csb(s0, c0, c2), c3))
  elex(c0, c1)
  csbiegf(s0, c0, universe, c2, c3)
  nfcvd(s0, c3, wcel(c0, universe))
  dfsbcq(s1, csb(s0, c0, c2), c3, w0)
  diff.universe.s(s0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm sbcco3g(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  âŠ¢ (c0 âˆˆ c1 â†’([c0 / s0][c2 / s1]w0 â†”[c3 / s1]w0))
  âŠ£ (s0 = c0 â†’ c2 = c3)
  âŠ£ d(s0, c0)
  âŠ£ d(s0, c3)
  âŠ£ d(s0, w0)
} = {
  bitrd(c0 âˆˆ c1, [c0 / s0][c2 / s1]w0, [c3 / s1]w0, [[c0 / s0]c2 / s1]w0)
  sbcnestg(s0, s1, c0, c1, c2, w0)
  3syl(c0 âˆˆ c1, ([[c0 / s0]c2 / s1]w0 â†”[c3 / s1]w0), c0 âˆˆ ğ•Œ, [c0 / s0]c2 = c3)
  elex(c0, c1)
  csbiegf(s0, c0, universe, c2, c3)
  nfcvd(s0, c3, c0 âˆˆ ğ•Œ)
  dfsbcq(s1, [c0 / s0]c2, c3, w0)
  diff.universe.s(s0)
}

blocks.name: csbco3g
blocks.content: Composition of two class substitutions. (Contributed by NM, 27-Nov-2005.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 11-Nov-2016.)
blocks.origin:
thm csbco3g(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wceq(csb(s0, c0, csb(s1, c2, c3)), csb(s1, c4, c3)))
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wceq(c2, c4))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s0, c4)
} = {
  eqtrd(csb(s0, c0, csb(s1, c2, c3)), csb(s1, c4, c3), csb(s1, csb(s0, c0, c2), c3), wcel(c0, c1))
  csbnestg(s0, s1, c0, c1, c2, c3)
  csbeq1d(s1, csb(s0, c0, c2), c3, c4, wcel(c0, c1))
  syl(wcel(c0, c1), wceq(csb(s0, c0, c2), c4), wcel(c0, universe))
  elex(c0, c1)
  csbiegf(s0, c0, universe, c2, c4)
  nfcvd(s0, c4, wcel(c0, universe))
  diff.universe.s(s0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm csbco3g(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  âŠ¢ (c0 âˆˆ c1 â†’[c0 / s0][c2 / s1]c3 =[c4 / s1]c3)
  âŠ£ (s0 = c0 â†’ c2 = c4)
  âŠ£ d(s0, c0)
  âŠ£ d(s0, c3)
  âŠ£ d(s0, c4)
} = {
  eqtrd([c0 / s0][c2 / s1]c3, [c4 / s1]c3, [[c0 / s0]c2 / s1]c3, c0 âˆˆ c1)
  csbnestg(s0, s1, c0, c1, c2, c3)
  csbeq1d(s1, [c0 / s0]c2, c3, c4, c0 âˆˆ c1)
  syl(c0 âˆˆ c1, [c0 / s0]c2 = c4, c0 âˆˆ ğ•Œ)
  elex(c0, c1)
  csbiegf(s0, c0, universe, c2, c4)
  nfcvd(s0, c4, c0 âˆˆ ğ•Œ)
  diff.universe.s(s0)
}

blocks.name: csbnest1g
blocks.content: Nest the composition of two substitutions. (Contributed by NM, 23-May-2006.) (Proof shortened by Mario Carneiro, 11-Nov-2016.)
blocks.origin:
thm csbnest1g(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wceq(csb(s0, c0, csb(s0, c2, c3)), csb(s0, csb(s0, c0, c2), c3)))
} = {
  3eqtr3g(csb(s0, c0, csb(s0, c2, c3)), csb(s0, csb(s0, c0, c2), c3), csb(s0, c0, csb(hs0, c2, csb(s0, cv(hs0), c3))), csb(hs0, csb(s0, c0, c2), csb(s0, cv(hs0), c3)), wcel(c0, c1))
  mpan2(wcel(c0, c1), wceq(csb(s0, c0, csb(hs0, c2, csb(s0, cv(hs0), c3))), csb(hs0, csb(s0, c0, c2), csb(s0, cv(hs0), c3))), wal(hs0, wnfc(s0, csb(s0, cv(hs0), c3))))
  ax-gen(hs0, wnfc(s0, csb(s0, cv(hs0), c3)))
  nfcsb1v(s0, cv(hs0), c3)
  csbnestgf(hs0, s0, c0, c1, csb(s0, cv(hs0), c3), c2)
  csbeq2i(s0, c0, csb(hs0, c2, csb(s0, cv(hs0), c3)), csb(s0, c2, c3))
  csbco(hs0, s0, c2, c3)
  csbco(hs0, s0, csb(s0, c0, c2), c3)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.c(c3)
}

thm csbnest1g(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  âŠ¢ (c0 âˆˆ c1 â†’[c0 / s0][c2 / s0]c3 =[[c0 / s0]c2 / s0]c3)
} = {
  3eqtr3g([c0 / s0][c2 / s0]c3, [[c0 / s0]c2 / s0]c3, [c0 / s0][c2 / hs0][hs0 / s0]c3, [[c0 / s0]c2 / hs0][hs0 / s0]c3, c0 âˆˆ c1)
  mpan2(c0 âˆˆ c1, [c0 / s0][c2 / hs0][hs0 / s0]c3 =[[c0 / s0]c2 / hs0][hs0 / s0]c3, âˆ€(hs0, F/(s0,[hs0 / s0]c3)))
  ax-gen(hs0, F/(s0,[hs0 / s0]c3))
  nfcsb1v(s0, hs0, c3)
  csbnestgf(hs0, s0, c0, c1, [hs0 / s0]c3, c2)
  csbeq2i(s0, c0, [c2 / hs0][hs0 / s0]c3, [c2 / s0]c3)
  csbco(hs0, s0, c2, c3)
  csbco(hs0, s0, [c0 / s0]c2, c3)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.c(c3)
}

blocks.name: csbvarg
blocks.content: The proper substitution of a class for setvar variable results in the class (if the class exists). (Contributed by NM, 10-Nov-2005.)
blocks.origin:
thm csbvarg(setvar s0, class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wceq(csb(s0, c0, cv(s0)), c0))
} = {
  syl(wcel(c0, c1), wceq(csb(s0, c0, cv(s0)), c0), wcel(c0, universe))
  elex(c0, c1)
  syl5eq(csb(s0, c0, cv(s0)), c0, cab(hs0, wsbc(hs1, c0, wcel(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)))), wcel(c0, universe))
  3eqtr3i(csb(s0, c0, cv(s0)), cab(hs0, wsbc(hs1, c0, wcel(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)))), csb(hs1, c0, csb(s0, cv(hs1), cv(s0))), csb(hs1, c0, cv(hs1)))
  csbeq2i(hs1, c0, csb(s0, cv(hs1), cv(s0)), cv(hs1))
  elv(hs1, wceq(csb(s0, cv(hs1), cv(s0)), cv(hs1)))
  syl5eq(csb(s0, cv(hs1), cv(s0)), cv(hs1), cab(hs0, wsbc(s0, cv(hs1), wcel(cv(hs0), cv(s0)))), wcel(cv(hs1), universe))
  df-csb(s0, hs0, cv(hs1), cv(s0))
  abbi1dv(hs0, cv(hs1), wcel(cv(hs1), universe), wsbc(s0, cv(hs1), wcel(cv(hs0), cv(s0))))
  sbcel2gv(s0, cv(hs1), universe, cv(hs0))
  csbco(hs1, s0, c0, cv(s0))
  df-csb(hs1, hs0, c0, cv(hs1))
  abbi1dv(hs0, c0, wcel(c0, universe), wsbc(hs1, c0, wcel(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))))
  sbcel2gv(hs1, c0, universe, cv(hs0))
  diff.hs0.c(cv(hs1))
  diff.hs0.c(cv(s0))
  diff.hs0.w(wcel(cv(hs1), universe))
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs1.c(cv(s0))
  diff.hs1.s(hs0)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.w(wcel(c0, universe))
  diff.hs1.c(cv(hs0))
}

thm csbvarg(setvar s0, class c0, class c1) {
  âŠ¢ (c0 âˆˆ c1 â†’[c0 / s0]s0 = c0)
} = {
  syl(c0 âˆˆ c1, [c0 / s0]s0 = c0, c0 âˆˆ ğ•Œ)
  elex(c0, c1)
  syl5eq([c0 / s0]s0, c0, { hs0 |[c0 / hs1]hs0 âˆˆ hs1 }, c0 âˆˆ ğ•Œ)
  3eqtr3i([c0 / s0]s0, { hs0 |[c0 / hs1]hs0 âˆˆ hs1 }, [c0 / hs1][hs1 / s0]s0, [c0 / hs1]hs1)
  csbeq2i(hs1, c0, [hs1 / s0]s0, hs1)
  elv(hs1, [hs1 / s0]s0 = hs1)
  syl5eq([hs1 / s0]s0, hs1, { hs0 |[hs1 / s0]hs0 âˆˆ s0 }, hs1 âˆˆ ğ•Œ)
  df-csb(s0, hs0, hs1, s0)
  abbi1dv(hs0, hs1, hs1 âˆˆ ğ•Œ, [hs1 / s0]hs0 âˆˆ s0)
  sbcel2gv(s0, hs1, universe, hs0)
  csbco(hs1, s0, c0, s0)
  df-csb(hs1, hs0, c0, hs1)
  abbi1dv(hs0, c0, c0 âˆˆ ğ•Œ, [c0 / hs1]hs0 âˆˆ hs1)
  sbcel2gv(hs1, c0, universe, hs0)
  diff.hs0.c(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(s0)
  diff.hs0.w(hs1 âˆˆ ğ•Œ)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs1.c(s0)
  diff.hs1.s(hs0)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.w(c0 âˆˆ ğ•Œ)
  diff.hs1.c(hs0)
}

blocks.origin:
thm sbccsb2(setvar s0, class c0, wff w0) {
  |- wb(wsbc(s0, c0, w0), wcel(c0, csb(s0, c0, cab(s0, w0))))
} = {
  pm5.21nii(wsbc(s0, c0, w0), wcel(c0, csb(s0, c0, cab(s0, w0))), wcel(c0, universe))
  sbcex(s0, c0, w0)
  elex(c0, csb(s0, c0, cab(s0, w0)))
  syl5bbr(wcel(c0, universe), wsbc(s0, c0, w0), wcel(c0, csb(s0, c0, cab(s0, w0))), wsbc(s0, c0, wcel(cv(s0), cab(s0, w0))))
  sbcbii(s0, c0, wcel(cv(s0), cab(s0, w0)), w0)
  abid(s0, w0)
  syl5bb(wcel(c0, universe), wsbc(s0, c0, wcel(cv(s0), cab(s0, w0))), wcel(c0, csb(s0, c0, cab(s0, w0))), wcel(csb(s0, c0, cv(s0)), csb(s0, c0, cab(s0, w0))))
  sbcel12(s0, c0, cv(s0), cab(s0, w0))
  eleq1d(csb(s0, c0, cv(s0)), csb(s0, c0, cab(s0, w0)), c0, wcel(c0, universe))
  csbvarg(s0, c0, universe)
}

  sbcbii(s0, c0, s0 âˆˆ { s0 | w0 }, w0)

blocks.name: sbnfc2
blocks.content: Two ways of expressing " ` x ` is (effectively) not free in ` A ` ". (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 14-Oct-2016.)
blocks.origin:
thm sbnfc2(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0) {
  |- wb(wnfc(s0, c0), wal(s1, wal(s2, wceq(csb(s0, cv(s1), c0), csb(s0, cv(s2), c0)))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s2, c0)
} = {
  impbii(wnfc(s0, c0), wal(s1, wal(s2, wceq(csb(s0, cv(s1), c0), csb(s0, cv(s2), c0)))))
  alrimivv(s1, s2, wnfc(s0, c0), wceq(csb(s0, cv(s1), c0), csb(s0, cv(s2), c0)))
  eqtr4d(csb(s0, cv(s1), c0), csb(s0, cv(s2), c0), c0, wnfc(s0, c0))
  mpan(wnfc(s0, c0), wceq(csb(s0, cv(s1), c0), c0), wcel(cv(s1), universe))
  vex(s1)
  csbtt(s0, cv(s1), universe, c0)
  mpan(wnfc(s0, c0), wceq(csb(s0, cv(s2), c0), c0), wcel(cv(s2), universe))
  vex(s2)
  csbtt(s0, cv(s2), universe, c0)
  nfcd(s0, hs0, c0, wal(s1, wal(s2, wceq(csb(s0, cv(s1), c0), csb(s0, cv(s2), c0)))))
  nfv(hs0, wal(s1, wal(s2, wceq(csb(s0, cv(s1), c0), csb(s0, cv(s2), c0)))))
  sylibr(wal(s1, wal(s2, wceq(csb(s0, cv(s1), c0), csb(s0, cv(s2), c0)))), wnf(s0, wcel(cv(hs0), c0)), wal(s1, wal(s2, wb(wsb(s1, s0, wcel(cv(hs0), c0)), wsb(s2, s0, wcel(cv(hs0), c0))))))
  2alimi(s1, s2, wceq(csb(s0, cv(s1), c0), csb(s0, cv(s2), c0)), wb(wsb(s1, s0, wcel(cv(hs0), c0)), wsb(s2, s0, wcel(cv(hs0), c0))))
  3bitr4g(wceq(csb(s0, cv(s1), c0), csb(s0, cv(s2), c0)), wsb(s1, s0, wcel(cv(hs0), c0)), wsb(s2, s0, wcel(cv(hs0), c0)), wcel(cv(hs0), csb(s0, cv(s1), c0)), wcel(cv(hs0), csb(s0, cv(s2), c0)))
  eleq2(csb(s0, cv(s1), c0), csb(s0, cv(s2), c0), cv(hs0))
  bitri(wsb(s1, s0, wcel(cv(hs0), c0)), wcel(cv(hs0), csb(s0, cv(s1), c0)), wsbc(s0, cv(s1), wcel(cv(hs0), c0)))
  sbsbc(s1, s0, wcel(cv(hs0), c0))
  sbcel2(s0, cv(s1), cv(hs0), c0)
  bitri(wsb(s2, s0, wcel(cv(hs0), c0)), wcel(cv(hs0), csb(s0, cv(s2), c0)), wsbc(s0, cv(s2), wcel(cv(hs0), c0)))
  sbsbc(s2, s0, wcel(cv(hs0), c0))
  sbcel2(s0, cv(s2), cv(hs0), c0)
  sbnf2(s0, s1, s2, wcel(cv(hs0), c0))
  diff.wnfc.s(s1, s0, c0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
  diff.wnfc.s(s2, s0, c0)
  diffss.ex(s2, s0)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.w(wal(s1, wal(s2, wceq(csb(s0, cv(s1), c0), csb(s0, cv(s2), c0)))))
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.wcel.s(s1, cv(hs0), c0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diff.wcel.s(s2, cv(hs0), c0)
  diff.cv.s(s2, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s2, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s2)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm sbnfc2(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0) {
  âŠ¢ (F/(s0, c0)â†” âˆ€(s1, âˆ€(s2,[s1 / s0]c0 =[s2 / s0]c0)))
  âŠ£ d(s0, s1)
  âŠ£ d(s0, s2)
  âŠ£ d(s1, s2)
  âŠ£ d(s1, c0)
  âŠ£ d(s2, c0)
} = {
  impbii(F/(s0, c0), âˆ€(s1, âˆ€(s2,[s1 / s0]c0 =[s2 / s0]c0)))
  alrimivv(s1, s2, F/(s0, c0), [s1 / s0]c0 =[s2 / s0]c0)
  eqtr4d([s1 / s0]c0, [s2 / s0]c0, c0, F/(s0, c0))
  mpan(F/(s0, c0), [s1 / s0]c0 = c0, s1 âˆˆ ğ•Œ)
  vex(s1)
  csbtt(s0, s1, universe, c0)
  mpan(F/(s0, c0), [s2 / s0]c0 = c0, s2 âˆˆ ğ•Œ)
  vex(s2)
  csbtt(s0, s2, universe, c0)
  nfcd(s0, hs0, c0, âˆ€(s1, âˆ€(s2,[s1 / s0]c0 =[s2 / s0]c0)))
  nfv(hs0, âˆ€(s1, âˆ€(s2,[s1 / s0]c0 =[s2 / s0]c0)))
  sylibr(âˆ€(s1, âˆ€(s2,[s1 / s0]c0 =[s2 / s0]c0)), F/(s0, hs0 âˆˆ c0), âˆ€(s1, âˆ€(s2,([s1 / s0]hs0 âˆˆ c0 â†”[s2 / s0]hs0 âˆˆ c0))))
  2alimi(s1, s2, [s1 / s0]c0 =[s2 / s0]c0, ([s1 / s0]hs0 âˆˆ c0 â†”[s2 / s0]hs0 âˆˆ c0))
  3bitr4g([s1 / s0]c0 =[s2 / s0]c0, [s1 / s0]hs0 âˆˆ c0, [s2 / s0]hs0 âˆˆ c0, hs0 âˆˆ[s1 / s0]c0, hs0 âˆˆ[s2 / s0]c0)
  eleq2([s1 / s0]c0, [s2 / s0]c0, hs0)
  bitri([s1 / s0]hs0 âˆˆ c0, hs0 âˆˆ[s1 / s0]c0, [s1 / s0]hs0 âˆˆ c0)
  sbsbc(s1, s0, hs0 âˆˆ c0)
  sbcel2(s0, s1, hs0, c0)
  bitri([s2 / s0]hs0 âˆˆ c0, hs0 âˆˆ[s2 / s0]c0, [s2 / s0]hs0 âˆˆ c0)
  sbsbc(s2, s0, hs0 âˆˆ c0)
  sbcel2(s0, s2, hs0, c0)
  sbnf2(s0, s1, s2, hs0 âˆˆ c0)
  diff.wnfc.s(s1, s0, c0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
  diff.wnfc.s(s2, s0, c0)
  diffss.ex(s2, s0)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.w(âˆ€(s1, âˆ€(s2,[s1 / s0]c0 =[s2 / s0]c0)))
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)

blocks.name: csbab
blocks.content: Move substitution into a class abstraction. (Contributed by NM, 13-Dec-2005.) (Revised by NM, 19-Aug-2018.)
blocks.origin:
thm csbab(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, wff w0) {
  |- wceq(csb(s0, c0, cab(s1, w0)), cab(s1, wsbc(s0, c0, w0)))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
} = {
  eqriv(hs0, csb(s0, c0, cab(s1, w0)), cab(s1, wsbc(s0, c0, w0)))
  3bitrri(wcel(cv(hs0), csb(s0, c0, cab(s1, w0))), wcel(cv(hs0), cab(s1, wsbc(s0, c0, w0))), wsbc(s1, cv(hs0), wsbc(s0, c0, w0)), wsbc(s0, c0, wcel(cv(hs0), cab(s1, w0))))
  bitri(wcel(cv(hs0), cab(s1, wsbc(s0, c0, w0))), wsbc(s1, cv(hs0), wsbc(s0, c0, w0)), wsb(hs0, s1, wsbc(s0, c0, w0)))
  df-clab(hs0, s1, wsbc(s0, c0, w0))
  sbsbc(hs0, s1, wsbc(s0, c0, w0))
  bitr4i(wsbc(s1, cv(hs0), wsbc(s0, c0, w0)), wsbc(s0, c0, wcel(cv(hs0), cab(s1, w0))), wsbc(s0, c0, wsbc(s1, cv(hs0), w0)))
  sbccom(s1, s0, cv(hs0), c0, w0)
  sbcbii(s0, c0, wcel(cv(hs0), cab(s1, w0)), wsbc(s1, cv(hs0), w0))
  bitri(wcel(cv(hs0), cab(s1, w0)), wsbc(s1, cv(hs0), w0), wsb(hs0, s1, w0))
  df-clab(hs0, s1, w0)
  sbsbc(hs0, s1, w0)
  sbcel2(s0, c0, cv(hs0), cab(s1, w0))
  diff.hs0.c(csb(s0, c0, cab(s1, w0)))
  diff.hs0.c(cab(s1, wsbc(s0, c0, w0)))
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
}

blocks.name: csbun
blocks.content: Distribution of class substitution over union of two classes. (Contributed by Drahflow, 23-Sep-2015.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 11-Dec-2016.) (Revised by NM, 13-Sep-2018.)
blocks.origin:
thm csbun(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wceq(csb(s0, c0, cun(c1, c2)), cun(csb(s0, c0, c1), csb(s0, c0, c2)))
} = {
  pm2.61i(wceq(csb(s0, c0, cun(c1, c2)), cun(csb(s0, c0, c1), csb(s0, c0, c2))), wcel(c0, universe))
  vtoclg(hs0, c0, universe, wceq(csb(s0, c0, cun(c1, c2)), cun(csb(s0, c0, c1), csb(s0, c0, c2))), wceq(csb(s0, cv(hs0), cun(c1, c2)), cun(csb(s0, cv(hs0), c1), csb(s0, cv(hs0), c2))))
  eqeq12d(csb(s0, cv(hs0), cun(c1, c2)), cun(csb(s0, cv(hs0), c1), csb(s0, cv(hs0), c2)), csb(s0, c0, cun(c1, c2)), cun(csb(s0, c0, c1), csb(s0, c0, c2)), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  csbeq1(s0, cv(hs0), c0, cun(c1, c2))
  uneq12d(csb(s0, cv(hs0), c1), csb(s0, cv(hs0), c2), csb(s0, c0, c1), csb(s0, c0, c2), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  csbeq1(s0, cv(hs0), c0, c1)
  csbeq1(s0, cv(hs0), c0, c2)
  csbief(s0, cv(hs0), cun(c1, c2), cun(csb(s0, cv(hs0), c1), csb(s0, cv(hs0), c2)))
  vex(hs0)
  nfun(s0, csb(s0, cv(hs0), c1), csb(s0, cv(hs0), c2))
  nfcsb1v(s0, cv(hs0), c1)
  nfcsb1v(s0, cv(hs0), c2)
  uneq12d(c1, c2, csb(s0, cv(hs0), c1), csb(s0, cv(hs0), c2), wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0)))
  csbeq1a(s0, cv(hs0), c1)
  csbeq1a(s0, cv(hs0), c2)
  3eqtr4rd(csb(s0, c0, cun(c1, c2)), cun(csb(s0, c0, c1), csb(s0, c0, c2)), cun(emptycls, emptycls), emptycls, wn(wcel(c0, universe)))
  a1i(wn(wcel(c0, universe)), wceq(cun(emptycls, emptycls), emptycls))
  un0(emptycls)
  uneq12d(csb(s0, c0, c1), csb(s0, c0, c2), emptycls, emptycls, wn(wcel(c0, universe)))
  csbprc(s0, c0, c1)
  csbprc(s0, c0, c2)
  csbprc(s0, c0, cun(c1, c2))
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.w(wceq(csb(s0, c0, cun(c1, c2)), cun(csb(s0, c0, c1), csb(s0, c0, c2))))
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
}

thm csbin(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2) {

} = {

  vtoclg(hs0, c0, universe, wceq(csb(s0, c0, cin(c1, c2)), cin(csb(s0, c0, c1), csb(s0, c0, c2))), wceq(csb(s0, cv(hs0), cin(c1, c2)), cin(csb(s0, cv(hs0), c1), csb(s0, cv(hs0), c2))))
  eqeq12d(csb(s0, cv(hs0), cin(c1, c2)), cin(csb(s0, cv(hs0), c1), csb(s0, cv(hs0), c2)), csb(s0, c0, cin(c1, c2)), cin(csb(s0, c0, c1), csb(s0, c0, c2)), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  csbeq1(s0, cv(hs0), c0, cin(c1, c2))
  ineq12d(csb(s0, cv(hs0), c1), csb(s0, cv(hs0), c2), csb(s0, c0, c1), csb(s0, c0, c2), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  csbeq1(s0, cv(hs0), c0, c1)
  csbeq1(s0, cv(hs0), c0, c2)
  csbief(s0, cv(hs0), cin(c1, c2), cin(csb(s0, cv(hs0), c1), csb(s0, cv(hs0), c2)))
  vex(hs0)
  nfin(s0, csb(s0, cv(hs0), c1), csb(s0, cv(hs0), c2))

  nfcsb1v(s0, cv(hs0), c2)

  csbeq1a(s0, cv(hs0), c1)
  csbeq1a(s0, cv(hs0), c2)
  eqtrd(csb(s0, c0, cin(c1, c2)), cin(csb(s0, c0, c1), csb(s0, c0, c2)), emptycls, wn(wcel(c0, universe)))
  csbprc(s0, c0, cin(c1, c2))
  syl6req(emptycls, cin(csb(s0, c0, c1), csb(s0, c0, c2)), cin(emptycls, emptycls), wn(wcel(c0, universe)))
  ineq12d(csb(s0, c0, c1), csb(s0, c0, c2), emptycls, emptycls, wn(wcel(c0, universe)))
  csbprc(s0, c0, c1)
  csbprc(s0, c0, c2)
  in0(emptycls)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.w(wceq(csb(s0, c0, cin(c1, c2)), cin(csb(s0, c0, c1), csb(s0, c0, c2))))
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
}

blocks.name: 2nreu
blocks.content: If there are two different sets fulfilling a wff (by implicit substitution), then there is no unique set fulfilling the wff. (Contributed by AV, 20-Jun-2023.)
blocks.origin:
thm 2nreu(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0, wff w1, wff w2) {
  |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c1), wne(c0, c2)), wi(wa(w0, w1), wn(wreu(s0, c1, w2))))
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wb(w2, w0))
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s0), c2), wb(w2, w1))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
  -| diffsw(s0, w1)
} = {
  ex(w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c1), wne(c0, c2)), wa(w0, w1), wn(wreu(s0, c1, w2)))
  sylibr(wa(w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c1), wne(c0, c2)), wa(w0, w1)), wn(wreu(s0, c1, w2)), wo(wn(wrex(s0, c1, w2)), wrex(s0, c1, wrex(hs0, c1, wn(wi(wa(w2, wsb(hs0, s0, w2)), wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0))))))))
  olcd(wa(w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c1), wne(c0, c2)), wa(w0, w1)), wn(wrex(s0, c1, w2)), wrex(s0, c1, wrex(hs0, c1, wn(wi(wa(w2, wsb(hs0, s0, w2)), wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0)))))))
  sylibr(wa(w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c1), wne(c0, c2)), wa(w0, w1)), wrex(s0, c1, wrex(hs0, c1, wn(wi(wa(w2, wsb(hs0, s0, w2)), wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0)))))), wrex(s0, c1, wrex(hs0, c1, wa(wa(w2, wsb(hs0, s0, w2)), wne(cv(s0), cv(hs0))))))
  syl112anc(wa(w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c1), wne(c0, c2)), wa(w0, w1)), wrex(s0, c1, wrex(hs0, c1, wa(wa(w2, wsb(hs0, s0, w2)), wne(cv(s0), cv(hs0))))), wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c1), wa(w0, wsbc(s0, c2, w2)), wne(c0, c2))
  simpl1(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c1), wne(c0, c2), wa(w0, w1))
  simpl2(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c1), wne(c0, c2), wa(w0, w1))
  jca(wa(w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c1), wne(c0, c2)), wa(w0, w1)), w0, wsbc(s0, c2, w2))
  simprl(w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c1), wne(c0, c2)), w0, w1)
  imp(w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c1), wne(c0, c2)), wa(w0, w1), wsbc(s0, c2, w2))
  adantld(w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c1), wne(c0, c2)), w0, w1, wsbc(s0, c2, w2))
  biimprd(w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c1), wne(c0, c2)), w1, wsbc(s0, c2, w2))
  3ad2ant2(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c1), wne(c0, c2), wb(wsbc(s0, c2, w2), w1))
  sbcieg(s0, c2, c1, w2, w1)
  simpl3(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c1), wne(c0, c2), wa(w0, w1))
  syl2anc(w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c1), wa(wa(w0, wsbc(s0, c2, w2)), wne(c0, c2))), wrex(s0, c1, wrex(hs0, c1, wa(wa(w2, wsb(hs0, s0, w2)), wne(cv(s0), cv(hs0))))), wcel(c0, c1), wsbc(s0, c0, wrex(hs0, c1, wa(wa(w2, wsb(hs0, s0, w2)), wne(cv(s0), cv(hs0))))))
  simp1(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c1), wa(wa(w0, wsbc(s0, c2, w2)), wne(c0, c2)))

blocks.name: vss
blocks.content: Only the universal class has the universal class as a subclass. (Contributed by NM, 17-Sep-2003.) (Proof shortened by Andrew Salmon, 26-Jun-2011.)

blocks.name: 0pss
blocks.content: The null set is a proper subset of any nonempty set. (Contributed by NM, 27-Feb-1996.)

blocks.name: npss0
blocks.content: No set is a proper subset of the empty set. (Contributed by NM, 17-Jun-1998.) (Proof shortened by Andrew Salmon, 26-Jun-2011.) (Proof shortened by JJ, 14-Jul-2021.)

blocks.name: pssv
blocks.content: Any non-universal class is a proper subclass of the universal class. (Contributed by NM, 17-May-1998.)

blocks.name: disj

blocks.name: disjel

blocks.name: vdif0
blocks.content: Universal class equality in terms of empty difference. (Contributed by NM, 17-Sep-2003.)

blocks.name: difrab0eq
blocks.content: If the difference between the restricting class of a restricted class abstraction and the restricted class abstraction is empty, the restricting class is equal to this restricted class abstraction. (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 31-Dec-2017.)

blocks.name: pssnel
blocks.content: A proper subclass has a member in one argument that's not in both. (Contributed by NM, 29-Feb-1996.)

blocks.name: disjdif
blocks.content: A class and its relative complement are disjoint. Theorem 38 of [Suppes] p. 29. (Contributed by NM, 24-Mar-1998.)

blocks.name: difin0
blocks.content: The difference of a class from its intersection is empty. Theorem 37 of [Suppes] p. 29. (Contributed by NM, 17-Aug-2004.) (Proof shortened by Andrew Salmon, 26-Jun-2011.)

blocks.name: unvdif
blocks.content: The union of a class and its complement is the universe. Theorem 5.1(5) of [Stoll] p. 17. (Contributed by NM, 17-Aug-2004.)

blocks.name: undif1
blocks.content: Absorption of difference by union. This decomposes a union into two disjoint classes (see ~ disjdif ). Theorem 35 of [Suppes] p. 29. (Contributed by NM, 19-May-1998.)
blocks.origin:

  eqtri(cun(cdif(universe, c1), c1), universe, cun(c1, cdif(universe, c1)))
  uncom(cdif(universe, c1), c1)
  unvdif(c1)

}

blocks.name: undif2
blocks.content: Absorption of difference by union. This decomposes a union into two disjoint classes (see ~ disjdif ). Part of proof of Corollary 6K of [Enderton] p. 144. (Contributed by NM, 19-May-1998.)

blocks.name: undifabs
blocks.content: Absorption of difference by union. (Contributed by NM, 18-Aug-2013.)

blocks.name: inundif
blocks.content: The intersection and class difference of a class with another class unite to give the original class. (Contributed by Paul Chapman, 5-Jun-2009.) (Proof shortened by Andrew Salmon, 26-Jun-2011.)

blocks.name: disjdif2
blocks.content: The difference of a class and a class disjoint from it is the original class. (Contributed by BJ, 21-Apr-2019.)

blocks.name: difun2
blocks.content: Absorption of union by difference. Theorem 36 of [Suppes] p. 29. (Contributed by NM, 19-May-1998.)

blocks.name: undif
blocks.content: Union of complementary parts into whole. (Contributed by NM, 22-Mar-1998.)

blocks.name: ssdifin0
blocks.content: A subset of a difference does not intersect the subtrahend. (Contributed by Jeff Hankins, 1-Sep-2013.) (Proof shortened by Mario Carneiro, 24-Aug-2015.)

blocks.name: ssdifeq0
blocks.content: A class is a subclass of itself subtracted from another iff it is the empty set. (Contributed by Steve Rodriguez, 20-Nov-2015.)

blocks.name: ssundif
blocks.content: A condition equivalent to inclusion in the union of two classes. (Contributed by NM, 26-Mar-2007.)

blocks.name: difcom
blocks.content: Swap the arguments of a class difference. (Contributed by NM, 29-Mar-2007.)

blocks.name: pssdifcom1
blocks.content: Two ways to express overlapping subsets. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 31-Oct-2014.)

blocks.name: pssdifcom2
blocks.content: Two ways to express non-covering pairs of subsets. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 31-Oct-2014.)

blocks.name: difdifdir
blocks.content: Distributive law for class difference. Exercise 4.8 of [Stoll] p. 16. (Contributed by NM, 18-Aug-2004.)

} = {
  bitrd(w0, wral(s0, c0, w1), wral(s0, c1, w1), wral(s0, cun(c0, cdif(c1, c0)), w1))
  syl6bbr(w0, wral(s0, c0, w1), wral(s0, cun(c0, cdif(c1, c0)), w1), wa(wral(s0, c0, w1), wral(s0, cdif(c1, c0), w1)))
  biantrud(w0, wral(s0, c0, w1), wral(s0, cdif(c1, c0), w1))

  diff.cdif.s(s0, c1, c0)
}

blocks.name: r19.2z
blocks.content: Theorem 19.2 of [Margaris] p. 89 with restricted quantifiers (compare ~ 19.2 ). The restricted version is valid only when the domain of quantification is not empty. (Contributed by NM, 15-Nov-2003.)

blocks.name: r19.2zb
blocks.content: A response to the notion that the condition ` A =/= (/) ` can be removed in ~ r19.2z . Interestingly enough, ` ph ` does not figure in the left-hand side. (Contributed by Jeff Hankins, 24-Aug-2009.)

blocks.name: ral0

blocks.name: ralf0

blocks.name: 2reu4
blocks.content: Definition of double restricted existential uniqueness ("exactly one ` x ` and exactly one ` y ` "), analogous to ~ 2eu4 . (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 1-Jul-2017.)
blocks.origin:
thm 2reu4(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, class c0, class c1, wff w0) {
  |- wb(wa(wreu(s0, c0, wrex(s1, c1, w0)), wreu(s1, c1, wrex(s0, c0, w0))), wa(wrex(s0, c0, wrex(s1, c1, w0)), wrex(s2, c0, wrex(s3, c1, wral(s0, c0, wral(s1, c1, wi(w0, wa(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s2)), wceq(cv(s1), cv(s3))))))))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s0, s3)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s3)
  -| diffss(s2, s3)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s2, c0)
  -| diffsc(s2, c1)
  -| diffsc(s3, c0)
  -| diffsc(s3, c1)
  -| diffsw(s2, w0)
  -| diffsw(s3, w0)
} = {
  pm5.21nii(wa(wreu(s0, c0, wrex(s1, c1, w0)), wreu(s1, c1, wrex(s0, c0, w0))), wa(wrex(s0, c0, wrex(s1, c1, w0)), wrex(s2, c0, wrex(s3, c1, wral(s0, c0, wral(s1, c1, wi(w0, wa(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s2)), wceq(cv(s1), cv(s3))))))))), wa(wne(c0, emptycls), wne(c1, emptycls)))
  anim12i(wreu(s0, c0, wrex(s1, c1, w0)), wreu(s1, c1, wrex(s0, c0, w0)), wne(c0, emptycls), wne(c1, emptycls))
  syl(wreu(s0, c0, wrex(s1, c1, w0)), wne(c0, emptycls), wrex(s0, c0, wrex(s1, c1, w0)))
  reurex(s0, c0, wrex(s1, c1, w0))
  rexn0(s0, c0, wrex(s1, c1, w0))
  syl(wreu(s1, c1, wrex(s0, c0, w0)), wne(c1, emptycls), wrex(s1, c1, wrex(s0, c0, w0)))
  reurex(s1, c1, wrex(s0, c0, w0))
  rexn0(s1, c1, wrex(s0, c0, w0))
  adantr(wrex(s0, c0, wrex(s1, c1, w0)), wrex(s2, c0, wrex(s3, c1, wral(s0, c0, wral(s1, c1, wi(w0, wa(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s2)), wceq(cv(s1), cv(s3)))))))), wa(wne(c0, emptycls), wne(c1, emptycls)))
  rexlimivv(s0, s1, c0, c1, w0, wa(wne(c0, emptycls), wne(c1, emptycls)))
  a1d(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s1), c1)), w0, wa(wne(c0, emptycls), wne(c1, emptycls)))
  anim12i(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s1), c1), wne(c0, emptycls), wne(c1, emptycls))
  ne0i(cv(s0), c0)
  ne0i(cv(s1), c1)
  2reu4lem(s0, s1, s2, s3, c0, c1, w0)
  diff.wa.s(s0, wne(c0, emptycls), wne(c1, emptycls))

  diff.wne.s(s0, c1, emptycls)
  diff.emptycls.s(s0)
  diff.wa.s(s1, wne(c0, emptycls), wne(c1, emptycls))
